languages.text: 到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止，战士受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}点。此外，战士还会获得{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}, and the Warrior gains +{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 到战士的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止，战士受到的所有伤害都会降低，等同于<u>（战士的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}/2）</u>点。此外，战士还会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于<u>坚韧加值</u>。

到战士的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}为止，战士受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}点。此外，战士还会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。

languages.text: Hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g}, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido se reduce en −{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} y obtiene +{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

Hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g}, todo el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} recibido se reduce en −{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} y obtiene +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}すべてを−{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}減少するとともに、+{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}, and the Warrior gains +{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、受けるダメージすべてを<u>(ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} / 2)</u> 減少するとともに、<u>TGHボーナス</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一次的な傷{/g}を受ける。

ファイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、受ける{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}すべてを−{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}減少するとともに、+{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus}の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一次的な傷{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Kriegers{/g} wird der erlittene {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um {uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} reduziert und der Krieger erhält +{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Until the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, all incoming {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} is reduced by −{uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b}, and the Warrior gains +{uip|THP|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Kriegers werden alle erhaltenen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schäden{/g} um −{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} reduziert und der Krieger erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

Bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Kriegers{/g} werden aller erlittener{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} um {uip|TOU|4d2f2a839d2340388d45cf4cf66c947b} reduziert und der Krieger erlangt +{unit_stat|WarhammerToughness|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
